summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 GMC TERRAIN. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE SEAT BELT INDEPENDENTLY TIGHTENED AND WOULD NOT UNLATCH. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THEY HAD TO CUT THE SEAT BELT. PENSKE BUICK GMC OF CERRITOS (18400 STUDEBAKER RD, CERRITOS, CA) WAS CONTACTED, BUT DID NOT DIAGNOSE THE FAILURE. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED AND DID NOT ASSIST. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 94,000.
